name: Mastery Talisman: Damage Control
description: After you play an Action Card: Create an Omni Element and remove one of your opponent's Multiplied Damage stacks. (Can be triggered up to 3 times per Round)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you play an Action Card:</color> Create an $[K411] and remove one of your opponent's $[C402020] stacks. (Can be triggered up to 3 times per Round)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you play an Action Card:</color> Create an <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color> and remove one of your opponent's Multiplied Damage stacks. (Can be triggered up to 3 times per Round)
